content: Github actions has some hiccups at the moment. Please don't be alarmed if your PR fails to build.
Whenever it comes back, we'll just have to re-comment bors r+ on all the PR's labeled "ready-to-merge". Annoying that https://www.githubstatus.com/ still hasn't noticed.
According to the github forums, it looks like actions just started working again. Trying again...
